p: The professional perspective goes beyond teacher pedagogy and focuses on the structure of roles and institutions in integrating expert knowledge into practice (Reimers 2020). Teachers are an essential pillar in CCE, for they are directly responsible for the teaching and learning process. There is plenty of literature on the impact of teacher-student relationships in the classroom (Forbes and Zint 2010; Roorda et al. 2011; García Bacete et al. 2014), as well as the importance of teachers as role models for the development of environmental literacy (Rickinson 2001; Stern et al. 2010).
